授業目的: The main objective is to improve students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised in the course.
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.
